commenter_a: Why does everyone need a day? Doesn't this kind of thing really inadvertently promote bias by constantly bringing up the differences between us all? We are all human and we all have strengths and weaknesses in different varieties this should be a strength among us not a divisive problem. If everyone would stop talking about it so much things would get much better. Make your decisions about people on an individual basis.
